tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
"Your teeth looking great. The doctor in India did a good job". This is what my dentist in USA said after taking X-rays and checking the new crowns I got from India with full mouth restoration. “Thank you” I said with a big sigh of relief! The doctor in India she is referring to is Dr.Praveena. That assurance from dentist sums up my review of Dr.Praveena but how’s the overall treatment?

When the prosthodontist in US gave me the price and timeline for my full mouth restoration - I was flabbergasted to say the least. I checked with my regular dentist about getting my crowns done in India and she suggested find a good dentist in India who can understand the patient notes from US dentist. Glad my cousin Dr.Roopa Srinivas referred me to Dr.Praveena, who has studied and practiced in US earlier. Dr.Praveena immediately came up with a treatment plan considering all notes from my dentist. She stuck to the plan accommodated all the appointments to complete my full mouth restoration of putting crowns for 28 tooth in the tight schedule of my hasty India trip.  She treated me with utmost professionalism answering my numerous questions along the way. Knowing that I have many social commitments in my tight schedule she was careful to make my treatment and trial period	with crowns as less painful as possible. At the end Dr.Praveena gave all the treatment notes along with pictures, 

Let me close with an email I received from my Dentist office after I shared the notes from Dr.Praveena:

“After reviewing the Dr notes, feel that all treatment was done according to standard of care. Only what was needed was done- no additional treatment. Proper notes were taken, and treatment outcome was as expected.”

Thank you Dr. Praveena. Please extend appreciation to your staff as well. They were very friendly. Wish you all the best.
reply_text: Thank you for your Stellar feedback Mr Basvi gaaru.  Glad to hear that you had good experience and were satisfied with our Dental Services. I appreciate the trust you had and for giving us the chance to serve you. Our team here at Just Smile  is committed to delivering high-quality service, and your feedback is a great encouragement to us. We thank you again for allowing us to take care of your dental needs and look forward to serving you when in need.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Hi, I visited dr. Praveena at the just smile clinic in hyderabad. She recommended me to go for the root canal treatment after the investigation and just during my first sitting which involved the basic cleaning of the tooth from inside *** **** ** * ***** ***** **** ****** ** ** ***** **** I was under the impact of anesthesia so i couldnt feel the pain then, after the sitting she just lightly mentioned about the bruised and swollen lip i had and promised me that its a light mark and will go away, it took 3 weeks to completely cure *** ** *** **** * **** ***** I consulted another dermat later on who finally told me that it was an instrumental injury which caused a deep tissue cut *** **** ** *** ******* *** ********* ****** ****** **** ****** ** ** *** ******* *** **** ** ********** ***** *** ******** ** *** ******* ** * ******* **** ** ***** ** **** ********** ** ******** * ******* **** **** *** *** *** ** *** ******** ** ***** ****** ******* I suffered in multiple ways ****** **** ***** ***** ***** *** ****** ****** not suggested bassed on the unprofessional behavior this clinic has
reply_text:
Thank you for taking time to post your review. I am sorry to hear your experience with us has not been to your satisfaction.  sorry, for the bruise which was an accident  but was not something intentional during the treatment. And for the healing which took longer than expected for you. I am committed to helping you as I am to all my patients.
We at Just Smile try to do our best to serve our patients with quality dental care and to commit to a Life long Dental health of our patients. 
Sincerely,
Dr.Praveena

review: How grateful I am that I can cite my experience with Dr. Praveena and her staff at Just Smile Family Dental Clinic as among my blessings! From my very first visit at the office, I was made to feel welcome and comfortable both by the friendly competence of the staff and the pleasant environment of the office itself. Dr. Praveena inspires the utmost confidence by her smile which is so wide that it seems apt to describe it as extending "from sea to shining sea" and by her ****** ** ********** ****** *** professionalism. Her patience and etiquette in dealing with senior citizens is highly commendable. Kudos and the highest recommendation to Dr. Praveena and everyone at Just Smile Family Dental Clinic!

Just Smile Dental Clinic was recommended to me by my colleague who had previously had a great experience . I can describe the state of my teeth as a mess . My ability to chew and apprearence was so poor. 
Dr Praveena had given a treatment plan concerning my dental issues and had explained me the procedure step by step . 
I had got done couple of Dental Implants and Bridges . 
I am so pleases I took her advice , I can now eat what I want . I feel so relaxed and I am in no pain. 
I have confidence now when I smile. 
Thank you Just Smile . I would recommend your service to my friends and family .

tags: Value for money,
reply_text:
Dear Neha ,
 I appreciate your concern that I was not available at the time of your appointment.  But I would also like to remind you that you had rescheduled/cancelled your appointment online 3 times between 8th of Jan and 18th of Jan before you showed up. My Receptionist had called you for confirmation but had no answer from your side between these dates. 
I am sorry that I was not available at that time, as I had to attend another patient at my other branch. Again if you had responded to the confirmation call from my clinic, I would have scheduled my appointments accordingly.
I always make sure that I am present during the appointment times. At JustSmile we provide quality care/services.
Appreciate your time taken for the feedback.
